mapper.select: select hotel_id,hotel_name,hotel_abbreviation,hotel_type,hotel_class, hotel_fax,hotel_email,hotel_phone,hotel_province,hotel_city, hotel_county,hotel_address,hotel_introduce,hotel_facilities, hotel_notice,hotel_time,hotel_owner ,r.relation_id,r.relation_type_id,r.`relation_owner`, r.relation_name,r.relation_phone,r.relation_email,r.relation_type ,i.img_id,i.img_path,i.img_time,i.img_type,i.other_id,i.supplier_type from hotel left join relation r on r.relation_type_id = hotel.hotel_id left join image i on i.other_id = hotel.hotel_id where (i.supplier_type = 2 or i.supplier_type is null) and (r.relation_type = 2 or r.relation_type is null) and hotel_id = #{hotel_id}
mapper.delete: delete from relation where relation_type = #{relation_type} and relation_id = #{relation_id}
mapper.select: select relation_id,relation_type,relation_type_id,relation_owner,relation_name,relation_phone, relation_email from relation where relation_type = 2 and relation_type_id = #{relation_type_id}
select hotel_price_id,hotel_id,hotel_choice,hotel_costed_pay,hotel_listed_pay, hotel_price_owner from hotel_price where hotel_id = #{hotel_id}
